typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{[0BILL_TYPE].[LEVEL01].[MEMBER_CAPTION]} as string,
		{[0COMP_CODE].[LEVEL01].[MEMBER_CAPTION]} as string,
		{[0DOC_NUMBER].[LEVEL01].[MEMBER_CAPTION]} as string,
		{[0CALDAY].[LEVEL01].[MEMBER_CAPTION]} as string,
		{[0CALMONTH2].[LEVEL01].[MEMBER_CAPTION]} as string,
		{[Measures].[624IRRSR9LDWI932059BH0PM2]} as string,
		{[Measures].[624IRRSR9LDWI932059BH246I]} as string,
		{[Measures].[624IRRSR9LDWI932059BH2GTM]} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	skipLines: 1) ~> ArchivoBW
ArchivoBW derive(Valor11 = toDecimal({[Measures].[624IRRSR9LDWI932059BH0PM2]}),
		Valor22 = toDecimal({[Measures].[624IRRSR9LDWI932059BH246I]}),
		Valor33 = toDecimal({[Measures].[624IRRSR9LDWI932059BH2GTM]})) ~> SalidaDataFlow
SalidaDataFlow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	emptyLinesAsHeader: 1,
	mapColumn(
		{[MEMBER_CAPTION]} = {[0BILL_TYPE].[LEVEL01].[MEMBER_CAPTION]},
		{[MEMBER_CAPTION]} = {[0COMP_CODE].[LEVEL01].[MEMBER_CAPTION]},
		{[MEMBER_CAPTION]} = {[0DOC_NUMBER].[LEVEL01].[MEMBER_CAPTION]},
		{[MEMBER_CAPTION]} = {[0CALDAY].[LEVEL01].[MEMBER_CAPTION]},
		{[MEMBER_CAPTION]} = {[0CALMONTH2].[LEVEL01].[MEMBER_CAPTION]},
		Valor11,
		Valor22,
		Valor33
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
